Title: Blacksmith's Back
Description:
The kith of Loamm request the skills of a seasoned blacksmith! We've heard of the wonders you uplanders make with smelted ore!

Our Kilnmaster, Mister Crubus, has heard you have devised a way to dig without claws or earth magic! What a wonderful invention!

Please deliver some of these "shovels" as soon as you can, won't you?
ObjectivesText: Deliver Sturdy Expedition Shovels to Kilnmaster Crubus in Loamm.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Deliver the items to Kilnmaster Crubus in Loamm
